entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -30.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kenora Airport 03:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow

Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 74 %

Dewpoint: -33.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
